description: LogicMonitor is a hosted, full-stack, infrastructure monitoring platform.

displayname.description: The display name of a host in your LogicMonitor account or the desired display name of a device to manage.

description.description: The long text description of the object in your LogicMonitor account.

company.description: The LogicMonitor account company name. If you would log in to your account at "superheroes.logicmonitor.com" you would use "superheroes."

hostname.description: The hostname of a host in your LogicMonitor account, or the desired hostname of a device to manage.

fullpath.description: The fullpath of the host group object you would like to manage.

properties.description: A dictionary of properties to set on the LogicMonitor host or host group.

action.description: The action you wish to perform on target.

user.description: A LogicMonitor user name. The module will authenticate and perform actions on behalf of this user.

groups.description: A list of groups that the host should be a member of.

duration.description: The duration (minutes) of the Scheduled Down Time (SDT).

alertenable.description: A boolean flag to turn alerting on or off for an object.

starttime.description: The time that the Scheduled Down Time (SDT) should begin.

password.description: The password of the specified LogicMonitor user

collector.description: The fully qualified domain name of a collector in your LogicMonitor account.

id.description: ID of the datasource to target.

target.description: The type of LogicMonitor object you wish to manage.
